headline: Ask HN: Will heroku honor any SLA in regards to the recent security breach
description:
In regards to : https://status.heroku.com/incidents/2413

Has anyone looked into, whether they are going to be refunding customers?

IANAL, is it such a stretch that this much down time and hassle might start qualifying as a breach of SLA?

like how many orgs have had their entire pipeline of years just turned off?

(edit 1):

- https://www.heroku.com/policy/salesforce-heroku-msa - https://c1.sfdcstatic.com/content/dam/web/en_us/www/documents/legal/salesforce_MSA.pdf
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 对于最近的安全漏洞，heroku是否会履行任何服务协议？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 對於最近的安全漏洞，heroku是否會履行任何服務協議？
description_zh-Hans:
关于：https://status.heroku.com/incidents/2413

有没有人调查过，他们是否会向客户退款？

IANAL，这么多的停机时间和麻烦可能会开始被视为违反SLA？

就像有多少个组织的整个管道多年来都被关闭？

（编辑1）：

- https://www.heroku.com/policy/salesforce-heroku-msa - https://c1.sfdcstatic.com/content/dam/web/en_us/www/documents/legal/salesforce_MSA.pdf
description_zh-Hant:
關於：https://status.heroku.com/incidents/2413

有沒有人調查過，他們是否會向客戶退款？

IANAL，這麼多的停機時間和麻煩可能會開始被視為違反SLA？

就像有多少個組織的整個管道多年來都被關閉？

（編輯1）：

- https://www.heroku.com/policy/salesforce-heroku-msa - https://c1.sfdcstatic.com/content/dam/web/en_us/www/documents/legal/salesforce_MSA.pdf
